channel.title: Chat with NCPs
channel.description: I am wanting to put a welcome NCP to tell new people how to do stuff, as well as guides for people to talke to to learn about a skill. How exactly would i go about doing this to make it so the player could have options to talk to the NCP?

item.title: Chat with NCPs

I am wanting to put a welcome NCP to tell new people how to do stuff, as well as guides for people to talke to to learn about a skill. How exactly would i go about doing this to make it so the player could have options to talk to the NCP?
